duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide critical care to patients in the ICU setting, monitoring their condition and responding to changes.
Deliver high-quality patient care, ensuring the well-being and comfort of each individual under your supervision.
Maintain accurate medical records and documentation of patient treatment and progress.
Be prepared to respond to medical emergencies, providing life-saving interventions as needed.
Collaborate with healthcare teams, including physicians, to optimize patient outcomes and care plans.
Demonstrate adaptability and resilience in high-pressure and rapidly changing healthcare environments.
Exhibit strong communication skills, both with patients and their families, as well as within the healthcare team.
Show compassion and empathy in patient interactions, providing emotional support as part of holistic care.

education_certification.credential: Active RN license in the state of practice
